directions: Combine roasted peppers, almonds, parsley, olive oil, vinegar, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper in a food processor. Blend until smooth.
Serve with Snack Factory(R) Original Pretzel Crisps(R).
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) jar roasted red bell peppers, drained
1 (7.2 ounce) package Original Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®
title: Romesco Dip
